short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture Application Workflow to obtain the TestWheel Application Data Inputs for Test Automation

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Overview: 

Effortlessly record the end-to-end interactions of your web application and export the data to run tests for the actions you have done.  

TestWheel recorder is the easy-to-use Chrome extension that allows developers and testers to seamlessly record every interaction on any web application and transform them into robust test cases.  

Intuitive Recording: Navigate through the web applications as you normally do. TestWheel's intelligent recording feature captures and records user actions such as clicks, keystrokes, form submissions, login page actions, and more, and displays them in list of test data. 

Visual Representation: Our user-friendly visual representation provides a clear view of test data that anyone can easily understand and use for a test run.  

Easy Integration: Export the acquired user flow data directly to the TestWheel platform with a single click. Manual scripting and coding knowledge not required. 

Enhance Efficiency: Leverage TestWheel’s recording extension and enhance the efficiency of your test cases. Save time and resources by automatically generating real time user interactions.  

Wide Range of Testing: With TestWheel extension, for any web application users are allowed to conduct functional, regression, unit, or integration testing. 

Customization Option: Users are entitled to customize the test data by adding assertions and modifying variables.   

Benefits of TestWheel Extension: 

Reduces the test script creation time effortlessly. 

Helps to create reliable test cases. 

Run the test cases anytime and update it when the application evolves. 

Share recorded test cases with your team for efficient test case management. 

Reduces the cost and increases the ROI. 

With TestWheel chrome extension transform and upgrade your automation testing into next generation. Download now. 

About TestWheel: 

TestWheel is a cloud-based AI augmented automation testing platform that provides invaluable testing solutions for businesses globally. Our script-less automation offers a wide range of testing products such as unit, regression, functional, API, performance/load tastings. The Automation Framework Tool of TestWheel covers the entire test cycle of an enterprise’s web and mobile application. 

We believe the testing should be simple, smart, and stress-free! 

Explore TestWheel more: https://www.testwheel.com/
